      • start

        public void start​(android.content.Context context,
                  MceSdkConfiguration mceSdkConfiguration)
        Description copied from interface: RegistrationClient
        This method should be called on when the activity's onStart method is called. The method initializes the sdk if this is the first time it is called and updates it if it isn't.
        Specified by:
        start in interface RegistrationClient
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context.
        mceSdkConfiguration - The mce sdk configuration
